title: unesco_heritage_Khami_Ruins_National_Monument
text:
Name: Khami Ruins National Monument. short_description:

Khami, which developed after the capital of Great Zimbabwe had been abandoned in the mid-16th century, is of great archaeological interest. The discovery of objects from Europe and China shows that Khami was a major centre for trade over a long period of time.

. date_inscribed: 1986. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 28.37666667. latitude: -20.15833333. area_hectares: 0. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Zimbabwe. Region: Africa. iso_code: zw. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
